title: Wizardry Indeed (4U108)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Gandalf to make an opponent discard a minion.
Lore:	“The hosts of Isengard roared, swaying this way and that, turning from fear to fear.”
Rarity:	U
